text: is a Japanese football player for MIO Biwako Shiga. His mother is a Brazilian. ==Career== After attending the football team of Kansai University, Reo Takeshita joined Nagano Parceiro in December 2017.https://parceiro.co.jp/news/top/201709266383.html ==Club statistics== Updated to 1 January 2020.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2019 (NSK MOOK)", 9 February 2019, Japan, (p. 259 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 255 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
